recommended_treatment: Systemic therapy with or without external beam radiation therapy and/or vaginal brachytherapy
description: High-grade serous carcinoma of the endometrium presenting as a polypoid lesion with focal superficial myometrial invasion (<1/4 thickness), negative lymph nodes, and no extrauterine disease.
patient_notes: The pathology report shows a high-grade uterine serous carcinoma removed by hysterectomy with focal superficial myometrial invasion and no nodal or distant disease. Based on NCCN guidelines for high-risk histology Stage IA uterine serous carcinoma, adjuvant systemic chemotherapy with or without vaginal brachytherapy is recommended to reduce recurrence risk.

verification.assessment: Staging (FIGO IA, pT1a pN0 pM0) is accurate based on <1/4 myometrial invasion and negative nodes; only the patient_notes field required correction to align with NCCN recommendations against observation alone for high-grade serous carcinoma.

patient_notes.issues: Observation alone is not recommended for high-grade uterine serous carcinoma even in Stage IA; adjuvant chemotherapy with or without vaginal brachytherapy is standard.
